required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ninth Dorsal Osteopathic Visceral Manipulation D9
clinical_study.official_title: Ninth Dorsal Osteopathic Visceral Manipulation D9 Affects Pancreas Blood Levels

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

clinical_study.source: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

brief_summary.textblock: The aims of this study is to verify that the vertebral manipulation of dorsal level D9 influences the pancreas biochemical and endocrinology blood values.

detailed_description.textblock: A longitudinal experimental study was conducted in which the osteopathic thrust maneuver was applied. In this research, 87 healthy subjects participated, of which 56.3% (n = 49) are men and 43.7% (n = 38) are women aged 19-29 who study at the Catholic University of Murcia.The blood analytical values of insulin and glycemia have been measured in 4 different times: at baseline, after 2,5 and 10 minutes of the technique application with the purpose to verify any possible change.

primary_outcome.description: The normal values of basal insulin measured with the imunoanalysis method are ˂ at 25.0 mU / l. If these values are exceeded, the effect of the manipulation in the study is verified
The normal values of basal glycemia measured with the enzymatic method vary between 60 - 105 mg / dl. The change of these values according to the reference laboratory has been the basis of the study.

arm_group.description: The control group did not received any treatment
Experimental group received the osteopathic maneuver and the blood value were measured at baseline, after 2,5 and 10 minutes.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- students between 18-27 years old
- healthy persons
- Acceptance of informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- pancreatitis
- diabetes I,II type
- anemia
- Alcohol intake for 12 hours prior.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia
